GSD.description:
scsi: qla2xxx: Fix scheduling while atomic

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.16.19 by commit 78225d6a2a4ffdb2250ce2b7691a9e68a3f86912. For more details please see the references link.
